thread.title: Heavy traffic on Dubai roads, drivers to face delays
thread.title_full: Heavy traffic on Dubai roads, drivers to face delays

title: Heavy traffic on Dubai roads, drivers to face delays
text:
Heavy traffic on Dubai roads, drivers to face delays Web Team Filed on February 5, 2017 | Last updated on February 5, 2017 at 09.19 am Share 
(KT file photo) Motorists coming in from Karama towards the Dubai World Trade Centre could also face delays. Dubai roads are heavily congested with traffic this morning. The traffic movement is slow along the Safa Park road and there is some congestion on the Business Bay towards the E44. Residents who are supposed to taking a flight in a few hours are advised to get to the airport as soon as possible as the traffic is moving extremely slowly along Garhoud heading towards the Dubai International Airport. Motorists coming in from Karama towards the Dubai World Trade Centre could also face delays. Share
